alert.note: Alert for Duval; Jim Wells; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 01 at 4:09PM CDT until April 01 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Critical Fire Danger Conditions Until Early This Evening for the Brush Country and for the Rio Grande Plains... .The combination of frequent southeast wind gusts to 25 to 30 mph and relative humidity values of 20 to 30 percent will result in a Critical Fire Danger condition this evening. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WIND AND VERY LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES FOR THE BRUSH COUNTRY AND FOR THE RIO GRANDE PLAINS... The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect until 7 PM CDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...La Salle...McMullen...Live Oak...Webb... Duval...Jim Wells. * TIMING...From 4 PM until 7 PM CDT this Evening * WIND...15 to 20 mph with frequent gusts to 30 mph * HUMIDITY...20 to 30 percent * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Residents are urged to exercise care with respect to all outdoor activities that could inadvertently cause wildfires. Report wildfires quickly to the nearest fire department or law enforcement office.

area.areaDesc: Duval; Jim Wells; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb
